bookSubtitle: Strategic Activism for the Systems-Thinking Age

meta.title: Radical Competence - Complete Book
meta.description: A comprehensive guide to strategic organizing for Green-stage activists ready to develop Yellow-level systems thinking and effective action.

targetAudience.title: Who This Book Is For
targetAudience.description: Written for Green-stage activists (like Dickie in Reading, UK) who are frustrated with ineffective organizing and ready to develop strategic, systems-level thinking without abandoning their values.

bookContext.companion: Tools and templates available at globalgovernanceframeworks.org/tools
